rooms.description: Spacious living and dining area with traditional Chettinad-style decor. Features ornate detailing and locally sourced materials.
Functional kitchen area integrated into the open space layout. Designed for modern culinary needs while retaining traditional aesthetic elements.
Primary bedroom with ample storage and built-in fixtures, aligned according to Vastu principles to ensure positive energy flow.
Well-equipped bathroom ensuring privacy and designed for comfort. Locally inspired tile patterns are used.
Dedicated private gym space with modern equipment integration, while maintaining the traditional Chettinad aesthetic.

openings.description: Grand entrance with a blend of modern and traditional design elements, following Vastu recommendations for auspicious entry.
Access point to the central courtyard that is designed as a focal area with natural light and ventilation.
Service exit for utilities and waste removal ensuring discreet design in line with Vastu practices.
